灟字的基本解释

灟
zhú
泪水。
灌注：“水潦灟焉。”
姓。

灟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhú］
［《集韻》朱欲切，入燭，章。］
(1)见“灟灟”。
(2)通“屬”。系。
(3)通“屬”。灌注。
(4)姓。南朝宋有灟恭期。见《宋书·褚叔度传》。

灟字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灟； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页664第04
【集韻】朱欲切，音燭。【博雅】灟灟，恭也。【禮·祭義】作屬屬。　又【淮南子·天文訓】馮馮翼翼，洞洞灟灟，故曰大昭。【註】馮翼，洞灟，無形之貌。　又【集韻】珠玉切，音瘃。目汁。

灟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
灟字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
灟
zhú
Tears.
Perfusion: "The water is sloppy."
name.
灟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhú］
["Ji Yun" Zhu Yuqi, into the candle, chapter. ]
(1) See "灟灟".
(2) Through "belonging". system.
(3) Through "belonging". perfusion.
(4) Last name. The Southern Dynasty and the Song Dynasty had a respectful period. See "Song Shu · Chu Shudu Biography".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　灟; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 664 04
[Jiyun] Zhu Yuqi, sound candle. [Bo Ya] Become a beggar, respectful. 【Ritual·Sacrifice】As a genus.　[Huainanzi·Tiantian Training] Feng Fengyiyi, he is awkward, so it is called Jokhang. [Note] Feng Yi, Dong Hao, invisible appearance.　[Jiyun] Bead and jade cut, sound distressed. Eye juice.
